proposal1.heroHeadline: Power Shifter is losing 300 hours a year on proposal creation. Here is exactly how it happens.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, crafting proposals for your MVP validation takes hours. With our system, it's done in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Every minute spent manually drafting proposals is a minute lost to inefficiencies.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Crafting proposals manually siphons away 25 hours per month. This is time that could be spent on strategic client engagements.

problems.title: Lost Revenue
problems.description: Each hour on proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This leads to lost opportunities worth $50,000 annually.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually created proposals often lack uniformity. Inconsistencies can cost you client trust, estimated at $20,000 in potential projects.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Slow proposal turnaround causes delays in client acquisition. This results in $15,000 of missed business per quarter.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Errors in proposals can cost corrections and rework. Each mistake costs an average of 5 hours to fix, leading to $10,000 of wasted labor annually.

problems.title: High Labor Cost
problems.description: The manual process requires significant manpower. The cost of this labor reaches $30,000 a year, which could be redirected to higher value tasks.

proposal1.solutionIntro: This AI system replaces your current manual proposal creation with efficiency and precision.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals are manually drafted. Our system automates this, completing it in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Branded Consistency
solutions.description: Manual proposals risk inconsistency. Our system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with your brand.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Manual processes are prone to errors. This system minimizes errors by automating content generation.

solutions.title: Cost Savings
solutions.description: Manual labor for proposals is expensive. Our solution reduces labor costs significantly by automating tasks.

solutions.title: Faster Client Acquisition
solutions.description: Proposal delays slow client onboarding. Automating proposals speeds up this process, enhancing client acquisition rates.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Power Shifter's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Power Shifter around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Power Shifter.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Future with Power Shifter's MVP Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's validate your ideas faster than ever with our 2-minute MVP Validator. We'll identify what's worth building, cutting, and optimizing.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every visitor who leaves your site without converting is revenue walking out the door.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Acme Corp's website bounce rate is 60%, leading to potential revenue loss of $500,000 annually.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rates
problems.description: Current conversion rates are below 1%, leaving $1.2 million in potential sales untapped each year.

problems.title: User Engagement Decline
problems.description: User engagement has dropped by 15% over the past year, reducing customer lifetime value by $300,000.

problems.title: Slow Feature Rollouts
problems.description: Delayed feature rollouts cause a 10% drop in user satisfaction, costing $200,000 in customer support.

problems.title: Inefficient Processes
problems.description: Process inefficiencies result in 20% higher operational costs, equating to $250,000 annually.

problems.title: Market Share Loss
problems.description: Acme Corp is losing market share to competitors, translating to a $700,000 revenue loss annually.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions directly address Acme Corp's current challenges.

solutions.title: MVP Validator
solutions.description: Quickly validate ideas to ensure resources are focused on what truly matters. This reduces wasted effort and enhances ROI.

solutions.title: UX/UI Design
solutions.description: Enhance user experience to boost engagement and conversion rates. This turns visitors into loyal customers.

solutions.title: Analytics Optimization
solutions.description: Refine analytics to capture actionable insights. This empowers smarter business decisions and strategy adjustments.

solutions.title: Agile Development
solutions.description: Implement agile methodologies to streamline processes and accelerate feature rollouts. This keeps customers engaged and satisfied.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Power Shifter is the playful, strategic partner you need.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Experience
whyUsCards.description: We've helped numerous clients transform their digital presence with tangible results.

whyUsCards.title: Deep Insights
whyUsCards.description: Our data-driven approach ensures every decision is backed by solid analytics.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with your team to understand your unique needs and goals.

whyUsCards.title: Innovation Driven
whyUsCards.description: Our team constantly explores new technologies and methodologies to keep you ahead.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team that's ready to elevate Acme Corp.

team.name: Holecka
team.bio: Holecka leads strategy and nurtures client relationships. With years of experience, he ensures successful project outcomes.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We'll dive deep into understanding your current challenges and objectives.

process.title: Design & Prototype
process.description: Our team crafts intuitive designs and prototypes for feedback.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: We build and rigorously test to ensure everything works seamlessly.

process.title: Launch & Optimization
process.description: We launch your project and continue optimizing for success.

pricing.name: Starter Package
pricing.description: Ideal for small projects or initial engagements.

lead.company_description:
POWER SHIFTER is a digital product and service design studio that partners with leading brands & scaleups to produce digital products ‚Äî applications, mobile apps, and websites ‚Äî that unlock the greatest amount of value possible for your brand's digital touch-points. 

For many companies, from startup to enterprise, it's hard to allocate the in-house time and talent and support the agile and iterative culture, required to build the calibre of application needed. It's even harder to do it fast enough that a competitor doesn't get there first ‚Äî or worse, do it better. 

Our passionate team lives and breathes product design every single day, it's all we do and have been doing for more than ten years. We have partnered with numerous companies and used Design Thinking processes to make the complex, simple. Achieving simplicity for your digital products is never easy, but it wins the hearts, minds, and brand loyalty of your customers: 64% of customers are willing to pay more for your products & services when they are simple and easy to use, and 61% of customers are more likely to recommend your brand because it provides simpler experiences.
